document.full_text: president barack obama's re-election campaign took a light-hearted line against "birthers" on wednesday by hawking "made in the usa" t-shirts and coffee mugs which picture the longer form birth certificate obama released last month.
document.title: obama campaign turns tables on birthers with t-shirts
lines_and_colors: president barack obama's re-election campaign took a light-hearted line against "birthers" on wednesday by hawking "made in the usa" t-shirts and coffee mugs which picture the longer form birth certificate obama released last month.
